questions.question: How far from the aerodrome of departure can a take-off alternate be?
options: 2 hour flight time at the 1 engine cruise speed for a 4-engine aeroplane
2 hours 40 for an ETOPS aircraft if its ETOPS limit is 2 hours 40
1 hour flight time at the all engine cruise speed for a 2-engine aircraft
2 hours flight time at the 1 engine inop cruise speed for a 3-engine aircraft
questions.solution: 2 hours flight time at the 1 engine inop cruise speed for a 3-engine aircraft

questions.question: At time of departure what are the rules regarding aerodromes?
options: The destination aerodrome must be within limits for landing
ETOPS en route aerodromes must be VMC
Destination and destination alternate aerodromes must be forecast to be at or above minima at ETA
Departure aerodrome must be forecast to be in limits from 1 hour before to 1 hour after ETA
questions.solution: Destination and destination alternate aerodromes must be forecast to be at or above minima at ETA

questions.question: Is the commander of a commercial air transport aeroplane required to use ATC?
options: Only in class A airspace
Yes wherever it is available
Only if flying IFR
Only at aerodromes

questions.question: When can a pilot deviate from a SID?
options: If in VMC
Once below MDH
Once above transition altitude
When cleared by Air Traffic

questions.question: What are the requirements concerning special categories of passengers?
options: Inadmissible passengers cannot be carried on commercial air transport aircraft
PRMs cannot sit next to emergency exits.
The captain is to be informed when deportees are carried
Persons in custody are to be seated on the flight deck
questions.solution: The captain is to be informed when deportees are carried

questions.question: What are the rules regarding the stowage of baggage and cargo?
options: The captain must physically check all baggage and cargo is secure before take-off
The senior cabin crew is responsible for ensuring it is secure
The flight despatcher must sign to say it is secure
The captain is responsible for ensuring it is secure
questions.solution: The captain is responsible for ensuring it is secure
